version_description: We made a few additional updates that makes Moment even better.

We are stoked to announce v2.5 of the Moment App.
We have dramatically improved the interface of the app to capture better pictures and videos, faster.

• New gestures. Slide up and down to select an effect. Slide right and left to tighten the overall picture. No more digging into the settings to select your sliders.

• Faster camera. We rebuilt the camera from the ground up to be significantly faster. Now snap away at your hearts content with confidence that we got the shot.

• Full display video recording. When recording the image fills the entire screen on your phone.

• Thumb reachable toolbar. We moved all of your photo and video shooting tools within a thumbs reach so you can quickly change modes or turn features on/off.

• Black design. We moved from white back to black. Your tools disappear when shooting, making it even easier to focus on what matters most.

Let us know what you think! Find the "Feedback" button in the Moment menu on the lower right of your screen.

Fixed a nasty bug that was preventing users from opening the app.

Send feedback via the Moment logo found in the app or email us with any issues at: hello@momentlens.co

Welcome, new users! We were proud to be a featured app in the App Store recently, and look forward to continuing to provide you the best capture and real-time editing tools.

Always striving to enhance your experience, this version includes:
• Improvements to app stability
• Fixes for reported bugs

Rad Stuff.
+ RAW photos. Capture high quality, uncompressed images in DNG format for better editing.
+ New 3D Shutter tool using Apple’s 3D Touch technology. Turn it on, half-press to lock onto your subject, and full press to shoot. Just like a real camera and great for action photos and videos.
+ New, adjustable toolbar. Press/hold to re-arrange the order of your tools.
+ Lens selection now works with our new Moment Superfish Lens.
+ iOS 10 compatible.

Now supporting the iPhone 7 Plus Dual Lens. Manually switch between three modes: Auto (uses both lenses together), 1x (locks the camera on the built in wide lens), and 2x (locks the camera on the built in tele lens).

Bug Fixes:
+ Fixed the crash when navigating to/from the gallery
+ Unlocked crosshairs now correctly auto-expose and auto-focus
+ On shutter half-press, the locked crosshair now correctly locks focus & exposure
+ Fixed a bug where loading spinner appeared every time after tapping the share button
+ Buttons are disabled while images are being prepared to share (previously, you could navigate out of the share screen while the spinner was showing, bringing the app to an unusable state)
+ Fix for a crash when sharing photos/videos that live in iCloud
+ Fix for metadata not showing correctly for newer iPhone models

We’re excited to announce that the Moment Case shutter button now works with the Apple camera app. This version includes a firmware update which will make your Moment Case compatible. Click into the case button and follow the instructions to update. Be sure not to close out of the app while updating to avoid any potential issues with the firmware.

We’ve also added a new video stabilization feature to the toolbar: choose from auto, standard, and cinematic mode to make your videos look silky smooth.

Fixes:
+ Toolbar functionality improvements
+ Firmware update improvements
+ Upgraded, user controlled video stabilization
+ Volume up button to take a photo

Bugs fixes! Happy holidays!

Fixes:
+ Corrected issue where locked crosshairs were continuing to auto expose/focus
+ Fixed bug where app froze when returning to camera from gallery, after backgrounding
+ Mysterious black camera view and white dot in upper left corner no longer appear
+ Camera view no longer randomly freezes when backgrounding the app for over 40 seconds

• Moment Widget
• Swipe left from your home or lock screen for quick access to the Moment App.
• Enable the new Moment Widget for quick shortcuts to capture a photo, record a video, or for an at-a-glance battery status of your Battery Photo Case.
• Moment Battery Photo Case Support
• Use the Battery Photos Case’s 2-stage shutter button to capture a photo or begin recording a video in the Moment app. The shutter button is also supported in the native iOS and 3rd-party camera apps that support taking a photo with the volume button.
• Quickly enable and disable phone charging from within the Moment App.
• Various bug fixes and improvements.

- Moment Battery Case
- Added the ability to enable/disable phone charging via the Moment Widget
- Fixed connectivity issues with V1 cases
- Improved case battery reporting
- Various bug fixes and improvements
- Various bug fixes and improvements
Various bug fixes and improvements
Connectivity and stability improvements for the Moment Battery Photo Case.

+ Fixed accessory compatibility issues for iOS 11 and iPhone 8/8+
+ Fixed an issue where the app took over audio even when not in video mode

Having issues with Moment hardware or software? We're here to help - drop us a line at hello@shopmoment.com

+ Fixed: 4K video issue on iPhone 8 Plus in Dual Lens mode
+ Fixed: Some older devices were crashing when capturing images
+ Fixed: Video sometimes recording at a slower frame rate & audio cutting out
+ Fixed: Video stabilization sometimes being off when it should be on in auto mode
+ Fixed: Swiping between images in the gallery on iOS 11

Having issues with the Moment app or accessories? We're here to help - drop us a line at hello@shopmoment.com

- fix to battery photo case shutter stability
- fixes to various video crashes
Updated the app layout to work with iPhone X

Battery Photo Case software update 2.0! This update includes the following improvements:
- General connection stability upgrades
- Battery reporting fixes
- The "buzzing" issue when plugging your case in to USB hubs or older USB ports to charge has been fixed
Updating to Battery Photo Case software version 2.0.0 now works properly with older cases.
Battery Photo Case software update fixes

- fix to battery photo case shutter stability
- fixes to various video crashes

Everything. A brand new, ground up redesign with more shooting options, full manual controls, and a big stability improvements. Upgrade to Pro to unlock all the new features.
We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

Thank you to everyone who has downloaded our new app and sending feedback our way!

Changes:
Fixes occasional crash when changing shutter speed or ISO
Fixes crash in gallery

From version 3.0:
Everything. A brand new, ground up redesign with more shooting options, full manual controls, and a big stability improvements. Upgrade to Pro to unlock all the new features.
We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

- Added haptic effect on 3D Shutter half press
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

+ De-squeeze anamorphic videos
+ Supports Moment's Anamorphic Lens
Fix - Audio occasionally not recorded with video

[+] ANAMORPHIC
Shoot and photos and videos in 2.40:1 format with your Moment Anamorphic lens. You can choose whether to save media de-squeezed or unprocessed for manual editing later.

[+] APPLE WATCH
Use your Apple Watch as a remote viewfinder and shutter.

[+] FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS
Fixed: Toolbars should be transparent in Anamorphic mode
Fixed: Anamorphic lens label cut off in lens selection menu
Fixed: Image rotation when orientation lock is on
Fixed: Selfies would occasionally process upside down
Fixed: Error setting flash mode, message would not go away

Please keep sending us new feature ideas and feedback. DM us @moment on Twitter or Instagram or reach out to hello@shopmoment.com.
Support for Moment iPhone X Battery Case
Bug fixes for iPhone X Battery Case

Pro Photo Case firmware update fixes

+ iPhone X users with the Pro Photo Case, please make sure update your firmware!
Compatibility for iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max

+ Loads of under the hood changes to make the app faster and more responsive, including moving to Apple's latest graphics rendering engine.
+ Siri shortcuts - Quick access to capture a photo or start a video.
+ Fixed - Focus would not stay locked after capturing a photo or video.

We also attacked some firmware and app issues with the Battery Photo Case (make sure to update your firmware when prompted):
+ Improved - Increased charging speed
+ Improved - Stability when the case battery is low
+ Fixed - Software shutter button responsiveness when connected to the Moment Pro Case



We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

Improvements for the Pro Photo Case (make sure to update your firmware when prompted):
+ Improved - battery reporting
+ Improved - Stability with wired and wireless charging

General App Updates
+ disabled the histogram due to a crash caused by hardware incompatibilities on older devices - iPhone 5s, iPad Air 1, iPad Mini 2 and 3

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

This our first big update to video. Filmmakers, this update is for you.

Pro video features you need, not the ones you don't.

[+] Multiple Color Profiles - Select from default, flat, or log color profiles to get the most out of your files in post-processing.

[+] Real-time Waveform Monitor - Evaluate video brightness and exposure across your image in real time.

[+] Video RGB Histogram - Dial in your video color, balance, and exposure with a live RGB histogram.

[+] Multiple Video Bitrates - Get precise control over video quality with standard, medium, and high bitrates to choose from.

[+] Dual-channel Audio Meters - Get just the right sound levels with real-time, precise, dual-channel (when available) audio level readout.

[+] NTSC and PAL frame rates and associated shutter speeds.

[+] Lots of bug fixes, performance improvements, and some design and interface tweaks all dedicated to a great video capture experience.

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

+ Darkroom integration - open and edit your photos in the Darkroom app directly from the Moment gallery.
+ Fixed a number of video and other bugs to improve stability and speed across photo and video modes.

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

+ Bug fixes and improvements

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

Another crop of bug fixes for you!

This release includes two big improvements to how we save your videos: if the app crashes, your video will be saved to the camera roll after you launch Moment again. We will also now stop recording if you go back to the home screen (which also saves your video). We don't want you to ever lose your videos!

Speaking of crashes, we fixed a crash with the lens selector button.

Several other smaller fixes are included:
+ Darkroom button should not show for videos
+ Some pixelation in the viewfinder in Anamorphic mode
+ Disabled applying anamorphic de-squeeze to selfie mode
+ Selected Moment lens being written to EXIF when camera is front-facing
+ Updated metadata for 58mm / 60mm Tele lenses, now reports "58-60mm"
+ Moment Lens selection not retained through restart
+ Crosshairs not being centered when launching the app
+ No longer rotating the capture interface while recording video
+ Waveform and RGB swapping when rotating

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.
Small bug fix release.

Despite the snow and sleet, we are here to deliver another release! As we transition to our next larger feature release, we have another smaller one for now to clear up some issues. Here's what's new!

+ Added support for RAW+JPG (see option in Settings)
+ The app will now de-squeeze HEIC and TIFF photos, along with JPG (but not RAW, as those are always untouched)
+ Improved the maximum shutter speed for newer phones, up to 1 second on the 1x lens
+ Fixed an bug for some users where previews of RAW photos were coming up blank or gray
+ Fixed ISO and shutter speed not matching original settings
+ Fixed Apple Watch being rotated 90 degrees
+ Fixed low-disk-space warning showing at the wrong time

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

This release is a quick fix for some crashing issues that have cropped up since our last release. Also it fixes an issue with audio missing from certain recorded videos.

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

This update is all about better focus. When asking what you want us to build next, we heard a lot of requests for more focus, so here you go.

Focus peaking - Turn it on the settings, use manual focus, and the edges of highest contrast (and therefore most in focus) are highlighted in green.

Zebra stripes - We overlay stripes onto the over and underexposed areas in the viewfinder.

Get the tips - email sign-up now in the app to receive seven emails, each with tips to help you get the most out of the app.

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

Introducing Slow Shutter, a new kind of long exposure. Set your tripod, open the shutter, and stop when you have the shot.

Motion Blur: smooth out movement in your shots.
Light Trails: turn lights into colorful streaks.
Live Photos: Replay slow shutter shots, share them as single photos, or export them as short videos...all from a single file.

Tag your shots #shotonmoment to be featured.

Introducing Distortion Correction for the Moment Superfish lens.

Adjust the distortion effect on your photos taken with the Moment Superfish lens. Apply changes live in the viewfinder (iPhone only) and in the gallery after capturing.

+ Fix for dual lens control being unresponsive

Introducing Distortion Correction for the Moment Superfish lens.

Adjust the distortion effect on your photos taken with the Moment Superfish lens. Apply changes live in the viewfinder (iPhone only) and in the gallery after capturing.

Tag your shots #shotonmoment to be featured.

Introducing Presets and Siri Shortcuts

Use Presets we have created for you, or create your own based on your favorite settings. Quickly recall a Preset to get your shot just right.

Siri Shortcuts can be set up to allow quick and easy access to the app. Start up the Moment app in any Preset of your choose and access the shortcut using Siri, the Shortcuts app, or by adding them to your Widgets panel. (iOS 13 Only)

Support for iOS 13, iPhone 11 Pro Ultra wide lens, up to 4K 60 fps for TrueDepth camera.

Tag your shots #shotonmoment to be featured.

New in 3.13.0:

Introducing support for DJI Osmo Mobile (2 & 3) and our newest Fisheye 14mm lens.

DJI Osmo Support - Manually adjust camera settings, swap device lenses, and trigger recording from the hardware buttons on your DJI Osmo.

Fisheye 14mm - Make precise distortion correction adjustments to your Fisheye photos right in the viewfinder or gallery.

Also new:
Choose between different processed photo quality options -- prioritize quality, speed, or select a balance of the two.

Tag your shots #shotonmoment to be featured.

version_name: 4.0:Welcome to Pro Camera 4.0...the best way to shoot time-lapses on your phone. Set your tripod

version_description:
Welcome to Pro Camera 4.0...the best way to shoot time-lapses on your phone. Set your tripod, select your settings (intervals, blurs, and brackets), and start recording.
+ Manual controls for intervals, blurs, and brackets.
+ Capture full 12MP resolution and RAW frames
+ Easy 4k video export
+ Exposure bracketing to enable creating HDR time-lapses (desktop software required)

Plus we’ve added additional features including exposure bracketing in photo mode, manual controls in slow shutter mode, a new horizon leveler, and the ability to change the app icon.

Tag your shots #shotonmoment to be featured.

+ Other bug fixes and improvements

To celebrate the release of iOS 14, we have added new widgets so you can start shooting with your favorite presets right from your homescreen! But that's not all, we are also introducing a new set of audio recording tools that will allow you to capture videos with amazing audio quality!

Widgets (iOS 14 Only)
Start shooting with your favorite presets right from your home screen. Add and customize the widget from your home screen, then tap to begin shooting.

iPhone Audio Controls
Choose between stereo (iOS 14, iPhone XR, X, XS, 11, SE Only) and mono recording, select your audio quality, and pick which built in mic to use with our new iPhone audio controls.

Shure MV88/MV88+ Compatible
Connect your MV88 or MV88+ to access advanced controls like audio presets, patterns, and stereo width.

Bluetooth Recording
Record audio with your Airpods and other Bluetooth mics - even use headphones to monitor your recording straight from the viewfinder.

Changes in 4.2.1:
+ Fix shutter randomly being trigger
+ Crash when recording Time-lapse using HEIF
+ Crash when stopping recording of video or Slow Shutter image
+ Other bug and crash fixes

Pro RAW is here!

Pro Camera now supports shooting photos with Apple's new Pro RAW format on iPhone 12 Pro and iPhone 12 Pro Max. Pro RAW integrates the amazing computational photography tech like Smart HDR and Deep Fusion into a RAW format for next level editing. Make sure to update your iPhone to iOS 14.3 to shoot in Pro RAW and tag @moment on IG to show us what you capture!

- Bug and crash fixes

We've got a bunch of fixes this week, mainly around our timelapse feature:
+ Fixes exporting/preview getting stuck in the middle
+ Fixes crash when exporting
+ Adds an alert when deleting a timelapse to prevent accidental deletes
+ Fixes a top crash related to video
+ and several more smaller bug fixes!

This update features a number of bug and crash fixes related to Timelapse and Slow Shutter modes:
+ Fixes a crash that would sometimes happen when capturing in Slow Shutter mode
+ Motion Blur / Light Trails effects are properly set when using Presets
+ The Motion Blur / Light Trails effects toolbar bugs have been fixed
+ Slow Shutter will now stop when using the volume button as a capture button

For any feedback, reach out to us at hello@shopmoment.com!

Bringing you additional bug fixes and stability improvements:
+ Fixes an edge case where the Timelapse mode frame control wouldn't switch to intervals
+ Fixes an edge case where the timelapse export button in the gallery wouldn't work
+ Fixes a case connectivity issue
+ Fixes a crash that would sometimes happen when capturing in Slow Shutter mode

For any feedback, reach out to us at hello@shopmoment.com!
